title: iPhone 13 Installment Plans in Pakistan Jan 2024
text: Home  Business  iPhone 13 Installment Plans in Pakistan Jan 2024 Tech giant Apple rolled out the iPhone 13 series three years back, featuring a modern processor and major improvements in camera setup. As latest iPhone 15 is making waves, Apple’s older models like the iPhone 13 continue their legacy due to the high cost of premium Apple phones and the impact of heavy taxes imposed by authorities in countries like Pakistan. Amid soaring demand, older iPhones ruled the local market, and commercial banks are providing options for purchasing the iPhone 13 through installment plans to make it more accessible. Besides the price factor, another preference for older iPhones is their reparability. Please check with commercial banks to get latest installment plans. iPhone 15 PTA approved price in Pakistan Jan 2024 Update   Your source for latest Pakistan, world news.
